title: DevFest Leiria 2019
description: First edition of the greatest tech conference in Leiria!

aboutBlock.title: What you need to know, before you ask.

featuredSessions.description: Our first edition of DevFest aims to bring the best tech conference to the city of Leiria. It will be one day of fun and much knowledge to gain and share.
featuredSessions.label: See our previous events

howItWas.description: Described by many as 'Google I/O of Ukraine', our team creates DevFest to be the best place for experience sharing in a phenomenal atmosphere.
howItWas.label: See how it was in 2016

ticketsBlock.title: Tickets
ticketsBlock.ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections, coffee breaks and lunch. The money raised by the ticket selling is going to be donated to a charity institution.

team.description:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps', communicating in 'gmail' and presenting in 'slides'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Leiria](http://gdgleiria.xyz/) - is an open non-profit community who tries to bring developers together with talks on a wide range of technical topics and learn new skills with workshops.

notifications.enabled: We will miss you but you can unsubscribe anytime
notifications.blocked: We can't send you notifications right now. Please enable notifications in your browser

blocks.title: Organizer
blocks.description: GDG Leiria, with the help of promoters, supporters and sponsors is a proud organizer of DevFest Leiria 2019

blocks.title: What is GDG?
blocks.description: Google Developers Groups (GDGs) are communities of volunteers who create exciting projects and share experiences on the latest technologies.

blocks.title: What is DevFest?
blocks.description: DevFests are community-led developer events hosted by Google Developer Groups around the globe.
